info.title: Form I-9 Audit Trail
info.description: You can use this API to import I-9 data from a third-party system into the SuccessFactors Onboarding module.

externalDocs.description: Migrating Form I-9 Data from a Third-Party System

parameters.name: Prefer
parameters.description: Determines the visible output fields. "return=minimal" displays "seqNo" and "externalId" for I-9 Audit Trail Record object. "return=representation" displays the full set of fields returned for the I-9 Audit Trail Record object.

post.description: The API imports I-9 reverification data from an existing system into Onboarding.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Specifies the number of items to retrieve.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Specifies the number of items to skip.

parameters.name: Prefer
parameters.description: Determines the visible output fields. "return=minimal" displays "seqNo" and "externalId" for I-9 Audit Trail Record object. "return=representation" displays the full set of fields returned for the I-9 Audit Trail Record object.

get.description: Retrieves I-9 Audit Trail Record objects using External Code.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Specifies the number of items to retrieve.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Specifies the number if items to skip.

parameters.name: Prefer
parameters.description: Determines the visible output fields. "return=minimal" displays "seqNo" and "externalId" for I-9 Audit Trail Record object. "return=representation" displays the full set of fields returned for the I-9 Audit Trail Record object.

get.summary: Gets audit trail record for selected user
get.description: Retrieves I-9 Audit Trail Record objects using the User Assignment Id.

x-sap-shortText: Imports Form I-9 reverification data into Onboarding.
